renderer_opengl: echo '[✔] Setting renderer to OpenGL (Default)...' && setprop debug.hwui.renderer opengl
renderer_skiagl: echo '[✔] Setting renderer to SkiaGL...' && setprop debug.hwui.renderer skiagl
renderer_skiavk: echo '[✔] Setting renderer to SkiaVK (Vulkan)...' && setprop debug.hwui.renderer skiavk
disable_thermal: echo '[✔] Disabling thermal throttling...' && cmd thermalservice override-status 1
disable_doze: echo '[✔] Disabling Doze mode to prevent throttling...' && dumpsys deviceidle disable
disable_wifi_power_save: echo '[✔] Disabling Wi-Fi Power Saving...' && settings put global wifi_power_save 0
force_deep_sleep: echo '[✔] Forcing device into deep sleep...' && dumpsys deviceidle force-idle
game_mode_on: echo '[✔] Activating native Game Mode...' && settings put global game_mode_on 1
vibration_control_off: echo '[✔] Disabling all haptic feedback...' && settings put system haptic_feedback_enabled 0
background_limiter_on: echo '[✔] Limiting background processes...' && settings put global background_process_limit 4
boot_optimizer_on: echo '[✔] Disabling boot animation sound...' && setprop ro.config.enable.bootsound 0
disable_wifi_scan: echo '[✔] Disabling background Wi-Fi scanning...' && settings put global wifi_scan_always_enabled 0
confirm_immersive_mode: echo '[✔] Auto-confirming immersive mode...' && settings put secure immersive_mode_confirmations confirmed
animation_speed_fast: echo '[✔] Setting UI animations to 0.5x...' && settings put global window_animation_scale 0.5 && settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.5 && settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.5
pointer_speed_fast: echo '[✔] Setting pointer speed to max...' && settings put system pointer_speed 7
power_mode_performance: echo '[✔] Activating High Performance Power Mode...' && cmd power set-fixed-performance-mode-enabled true && cmd power set-adaptive-power-saver-enabled false
fps_unlocker_on: echo '[✔] Forcing max refresh rate across system...' && settings put system peak_refresh_rate 999 && settings put system min_refresh_rate 999 && settings put secure user_refresh_rate 999 && settings put system miui_refresh_rate 999
force_gpu_rendering: echo '[✔] Forcing GPU for all 2D rendering...' && setprop debug.hwui.force_hw_ui true && settings put global disable_hw_overlays 1
enable_gputuner: echo '[✔] Enabling GPU Tuner switch...' && settings put global GPUTUNER_SWITCH true
force_angle_for_app: echo '[✔] Forcing ANGLE (Vulkan) for {packageName}...' && settings put global angle_gl_driver_selection_pkgs {packageName} && settings put global angle_gl_driver_selection_values angle
force_updatable_driver_for_app: echo '[✔] Forcing Updatable Driver for {packageName}...' && settings put global updatable_driver_production_opt_in_apps {packageName}
